product_name: Sanuk Donna Holiday Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Give your feet a vacation with the comfortable Sanuk Donna Holiday Shoes. The vintage Hawaiian print will have you dreaming of the tropics all year round. Built with sandal footbeds, canvas uppers and soft corduroy linings, the Donna Holiday is part of Sanuk's Sidewalk Surfer line. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soft EVA footbeds feature AEGIS(R) antimicrobial additive to help deter odors. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Give your feet a vacation with the comfortable Sanuk Donna Holiday Shoes. The vintage Hawaiian print will have you dreaming of the tropics all year round.
